data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Memorandum of Understanding /Agreements
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 30 of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015 we hereby inform that Nephrocare Healthcare Services Philippines Inc. step-down wholly owned subsidiary of the Company has acquired a Dialysis centre and has executed Asset Transfer Agreement as per the disclosure annexed herewith.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Monitoring Agency Report
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 32 of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015 read with Reg 41 of SEBI ICDR Regulations 2018 please find enclosed Monitoring Agency Report for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: This is further to the intimation done by the Company on 30th January 2026 with respect to the Result Conference Call hosted by the Management of our Company on Wednesday 11th February 2026 at 04:00 p.m. (Indian Standard Time) to discuss the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025. The audio recording of the Conference Call has been uploaded on our website at https://nephroplus.com/api/assets/investors/disclosures-under-reg-46/investors-analysts-meet/2025-26/Investor_Call_Audio_Q3FY26.mp3

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome

The audio recording of the Conference Call has been uploaded on our website at https://nephroplus.com/api/assets/investors/disclosures-under-reg-46/investors-analysts-meet/2025-26/Investor_Call_Audio_Q3FY26.mp3

data.news_body: Please find attached herewith Press Release for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Designation of Mr. Ravindra Tiwari AVP - Internal Audit as SMP of the Company w.e.f. February 10 2026 as per SEBI Listing Regulations.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On February 10 2026
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Tuesday February 10 2026 inter-alia considered and approved Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025. A copy of the said financial results is enclosed along with limited review reports issued by M/s. B S R and Co Chartered Accountants (FRN - 128510W) Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer"s Report
data.news_body: Voting results under Regulation 44(3) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 along with Scrutinizers Report

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations we hereby inform you that the Company has scheduled an Investor Result Conference Call on Wednesday 11th February 2026 at 16:00 (Indian Standard Time) to discuss the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025. A copy of the invitation is attached for your information.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Considering And Approving Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2025.
data.news_body: Nephrocare Health Services Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 10/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Memorandum of Understanding /Agreements
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 30 of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015 we hereby inform that Nephrocare Health Services Philippines Inc the Step down subsidiary of the Company has acquired a Dialysis centre  and has executed Asset Transfer Agreement and Memorandum of Agreement as per the disclosure annexed herewith.

data.caption: Issuance Of Corporate Guarantee For And On Behalf Of Nephrocare Health Care Services Philippines Inc. Philippines Step-Down Wholly-Owned Subsidiary Not Exceeding USD 6.00 Million.
data.news_body: Disclosure under Reg 30 of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015 - Issuance of a Corporate Guarantee for and on behalf of Nephrocare Health Care Services Philippines Inc. Step-down wholly owned subsidiary not exceeding USD 6.00 million.

data.news_body: We are enclosing herewith a certificate under Reg 74(5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018 for quarter ended 31st December 2025 received from M/s. KFIN Technologies Limited.

data.descriptor: Appointment of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Appointment of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
data.news_body: Intimation under Reg 6(1) of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015; Mr. Kishore Kathri (M. no. F9895) has been appointed as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer w.e.f. 16th July 2025 and he continues to be the Compliance Officer of the Company.

data.caption: Intimation Under Reg 8(2) Of SEBI (PIT) Reg 2015 Enclosed Is The Code Of Practices And Procedures For Fair Disclosure Of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 8(2) of SEBI (PIT) Reg 2015 please find enclosed is the code of practices and procedures for fair disclosure of UPSI.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30(5) Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 30(5) of SEBI LODR 2015 the Board of Directors of the Company have authorised the officials of the Company as per the attachment to determine the materiality of an event or information and to make appropriate disclosure on timely basis.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Nephrocare Health Services Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from December 17 2025 the Equity Shares of Nephrocare Health Services Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544647) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251216- dated December 16 2025.
